SCTX - Script Source:
Scn fbmwTRsothaSilAzuraScript

short doonce
short state
short moved


begin gamemode

	if getstage fbmwTRSothaSil < 100 || state == 30
		return
	endif


	if GetStage fbmwTRSothaSil == 100 && GetDisabled == 1
		Enable
	endif


	if  GetStage fbmwMQ14 < 50 && doonce < 1
		if GetDeadCount fbmwVivec == 0
			set fbmwTRSothaSil.gameState to 1
			set doonce to 1
		else
			set fbmwTRSothaSil.gameState to 2
			set doonce to 1
		endif
	elseif GetStage fbmwMQ14 == 50 
		if GetDeadCount fbmwVivec == 0
			set fbmwTRSothaSil.gameState to 3
			set doonce to 1
		else
			set fbmwTRSothaSil.gameState to 4
			set doonce to 1
		endif
	endif

	if moved == 0
		fbmwTRSothaSilAzuraAvatar.moveto fbmwTRAzuramarker
		set moved to 1
	endif



	if GetDistance Player > 0 && state < 1
		if GetStage fbmwTRSothaSil == 100 
			DisablePlayerControls
			PlayGroup FastForward 1
			set state to 1
		endif
	endif

	if GetDisabled == 0
		if state == 1
			;PlayGroup Forward 1
			Set state to 2
		endif



		if state == 2
			if fbmwTRSothaSil.Azurastate < 10
				set fbmwTRSothaSil.Azurastate to 10
				fbmwTRSothaSilAzuraAvatar.StartConversation fbmwTRSothaSilAzuraAvatar 1TRAzuraEndTalk
				set fbmwTRSothaSil.Azurastate to 11
			endif



			if fbmwTRSothaSil.azurastate == 12
				fbmwTRSothaSilAzuraAvatar.StartConversation fbmwTRSothaSilAzuraAvatar 1TRAzuraEndTalk
				set fbmwTRSothaSil.Azurastate to 13
			endif

			if fbmwTRSothaSil.azurastate == 14
				fbmwTRSothaSilAzuraAvatar.StartConversation fbmwTRSothaSilAzuraAvatar 1TRAzuraEndTalk
				set fbmwTRSothaSil.Azurastate to 15
				set state to 3
			endif
		endif
	endif

	if state == 3
		if fbmwTRSothaSil.Azurastate == 20 && GetStage fbmwTRSothaSil == 110
			PlayGroup Backward 1
			set state to 30
			EnablePlayerControls
			Disable
		endif
	endif
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 43 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
